## Panel macro rendering.macro.panel.name=Panel rendering.macro.panel.description=Add the Panel macro to a page to format your text in a customizable coloured panel. rendering.macro.panel.content.description=Add the Panel content. It supports plain text and XWiki 2.1 syntax. rendering.macro.panel.parameter.title.name=Panel Title rendering.macro.panel.parameter.title.description=The title of the panel. If specified, this title will be displayed in its own title row. rendering.macro.panel.parameter.titleColor.name=Title Text Color rendering.macro.panel.parameter.titleColor.description=The color of the text in the title row of the panel. Colors can be specified as HTML color names or hexadecimal codes. rendering.macro.panel.parameter.titleBGColor.name=Title Background Color rendering.macro.panel.parameter.titleBGColor.description=The background color of the title row of the panel. Colors can be specified as HTML color names or hexadecimal codes. rendering.macro.panel.parameter.bgColor.name=Background Color rendering.macro.panel.parameter.bgColor.description=The background color of the panel. Colors can be specified as HTML color names or hexadecimal codes. rendering.macro.panel.parameter.borderStyle.name=Border Style rendering.macro.panel.parameter.borderStyle.description=The style of the panel's border. Accepted values are solid, dashed and other valid CSS border styles. rendering.macro.panel.parameter.borderColor.name=Border Color rendering.macro.panel.parameter.borderColor.description=The color of the panel's border. Colors can be specified as HTML color names or hexadecimal codes. rendering.macro.panel.parameter.borderWidth.name=Border Width rendering.macro.panel.parameter.borderWidth.description=The width of the panel's border expressed in pixels. Only value is accepted (e.g: 14)
## Status macro rendering.macro.status.name=Status rendering.macro.status.description=Insert a colored label in the text to highlight the status of an item. rendering.macro.status.parameter.colour.name=Color rendering.macro.status.parameter.colour.description=The color of the status(text color and background color). The following colors are available: "Blue", "Green", "Grey", "Purple", "Red" and "Yellow". Default: "Grey". rendering.macro.status.parameter.title.name=Title rendering.macro.status.parameter.title.description=The text of the status. If not specified, the color name will be displayed (e.g.:"Grey"). rendering.macro.status.parameter.subtle.name=Subtle rendering.macro.status.parameter.subtle.description=The aspect of the status: either white text on dark color background or dark color text on light color background. This is a boolean parameter so it should be filled with "true" or "false". Default: "false" (white text on dark color background).
